title: @Reav3 Shared splash arts
body:
Hey Reav3, I got a suggestion for the Fnatic splash art and one question for the Pentakill splash art.

Fnatic - It should be flipped so Jarvan and Gragas aren't partially hidden behind the champion skins and info (if possible, it doesn't have to happen, just a suggestion)

Now here's my question for Pentakill, when Yorick get's his full VGU later this year, will his splash art be flipped for Pentakill? Right now he's completely hidden by the champion info and skins.

replies.body:
oh Reav3, i was referring to the champion page where the ability info/lore/skins/champion data is

not talking about the champion select screen
This should actually be resolved in the new client I believe as it displays splash art centered
With Yorick's rework coming up, wouldn't it just mean he'd have a new splash for all the skins?  I mean, sure Pentakill is an updated splash but what if he is gonna be really different looking?
We will be updating Yorick in the pentakill splash, but not reworking the entire splash.
